term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - intercalation in polymer chemistry
term.title: intercalation

item.text: Process by which a substance becomes transferred into pre-existing spaces of molecular dimensions in a second substance.

notes.item: The term as defined here is specific to polymer science. An alternative definition of 'intercalation' applies in some other fields of chemistry.

sources.item: PAC, 2004, 76, 1985. 'Definition of terms related to polymer blends, composites, and multiphase polymeric materials (IUPAC Recommendations 2004)' on page 1991 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200476111985)
